text.section: There is hereby created within the Finance and Administration Cabinet an agency of state government known as the Commonwealth Office of Technology.

The Commonwealth Office of Technology shall be headed by an executive director, also known as the chief information officer, appointed by the secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet. Duties and functions of the executive director shall include serving on the Governor's Executive Cabinet and those established in KRS 42.730.
Executive directors and division directors appointed under this section shall be appointed by the secretary with the approval of the Governor.
